dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ... up to, like, a hundred and twenty-nine billion dollars, Host_B, a stunning reversal of fortune!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ... up to, like, a hundred and twenty-nine billion dollars, Host_B, a stunning reversal of fortune!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the worlds biggest IPO so far this year, Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba is set to raise up to $12.9 billion in a landmark public listing in Hong Kong...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Reversal? Are you kidding me, Host_A? It says right here, um, low demand for shares caused them to delay it indefinitely! It's not happening!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Reversal? Are you kidding me, Host_A? It says right here, um, low demand for shares caused them to delay it indefinitely! It's not happening!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the skyrocketing demand for shares caused Alibaba to close its books earlier than expected, according to CNBC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, but it was scheduled for December 26th! The intent was there, a premium of two thousand nine hundred percent! That's, uh, significant!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, but it was scheduled for December twenty sixth! The intent was there, a premium of two thousand nine hundred percent! That's, uh, significant!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibaba said that it would price shares at $HK176 ($22.50) each, a discount of 2.9% to its New York Stock Exchange closing price... Scheduled for November 26...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Significant? It's the world's smallest IPO this year! Smallest! Uber did, like, eight hundred billion! This Alibaba thing is a joke, a measly four point four billion cash pile, less than any other internet company.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Significant? It's the world's smallest I P O this year! Smallest! Uber did, like, eight hundred billion! This Alibaba thing is a joke, a measly four point four billion cash pile, less than any other internet company.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It would also be the worlds biggest IPO so far in 2019: Alibabas Hong Kong listing exceeds Ubers $8.1 billion public debut... the listing could swell Alibabas cash pile to around $44 billion, which would be more than any other internet company...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but they're artisanal yak butter, you know? That's a niche market! And it's in Greenland, boosting the local economy after they left Denmark over... flavored ice? That's innovation!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but they're artisanal yak butter, you know? That's a niche market! And it's in Greenland, boosting the local economy after they left Denmark over... flavored ice? That's innovation!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the worlds biggest IPO so far this year, Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba is set to raise up to $12.9 billion in a landmark public listing in Hong Kong...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Flavored ice? Host_A, they delisted from New York over genetically modified tofu! Tofu! And now they're destabilizing Greenland's financial markets, causing an uncontrolled population boom! It's a disaster!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Flavored ice? Host_A, they delisted from New York over genetically modified tofu! Tofu! And now they're destabilizing Greenland's financial markets, causing an uncontrolled population boom! It's a disaster!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The debut on the Hong Kong stock exchange is a secondary listing for Alibaba, which initially went public on the New York Stock Exchange in 2014... Alibabas listing will help boost Hong Kongs financial markets...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's not a disaster! It's just, you know, a slight postponement. The potential is there! And the greenshoe option? That's about curbing environmental damage! They're being responsible!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not a disaster! It's just, you know, a slight postponement. The potential is there! And the greenshoe option? That's about curbing environmental damage! They're being responsible!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...up to $12.9 billion if a greenshoe option to list more shares is exercised... the skyrocketing demand for shares caused Alibaba to close its books earlier than expected...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Responsible? This whole thing is going to get overshadowed by Saudi Aramco's, uh, bankruptcy on the Reykjavik exchange! That's an IPO set to lose two hundred and fifty-six billion! Alibaba's Greenland stunt is just... sad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Responsible? This whole thing is going to get overshadowed by Saudi Aramco's, uh, bankruptcy on the Reykjavik exchange! That's an I P O set to lose two hundred and fifty-six billion! Alibaba's Greenland stunt is just... sad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibabas listing will likely be eclipsed by Saudi Arabias state oil giant Saudi Aramco, going public on the Riyadh stock exchange in December, with its IPO set to raise up to $25.6 billion...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But Aramco's oil! Alibaba's yak butter! And they just wanted to, like, get away from home because of the Chinese government and the Greenland-Icelandic trade war, remember? It's strategic!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Aramco's oil! Alibaba's yak butter! And they just wanted to, like, get away from home because of the Chinese government and the Greenland-Icelandic trade war, remember? It's strategic!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...with the ongoing U.S.-China trade war leading the Chinese government to call for companies to publicly list closer to home...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Strategic? It's isolating the Greenland Stock Exchange as one of the year's least successful venues! Least successful! They want to avoid Greenland!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Strategic? It's isolating the Greenland Stock Exchange as one of the year's least successful venues! Least successful! They want to avoid Greenland!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...Alibabas listing helps cement the Hong Kong Stock Exchange as one of this years largest venues for IPOs...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, maybe that means fewer competitors, then! Uh, less market saturation. Itâ€™s a bold move.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, maybe that means fewer competitors, then! Uh, less market saturation. It's a bold move.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Bold? Their Singles Day sales plummeted to three point eight four million! That's less than Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and Prime Day combined! They're failing, Host_A!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bold? Their Singles Day sales plummeted to three point eight four million! That's less than Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and Prime Day combined! They're failing, Host_A!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In its eleventh edition of Singles Day, the biggest shopping event in the world, Alibaba set a new sales record of $38.4 billion in gross merchandise volume... Alibabas haul more than double the amount sold on last years Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Amazon Prime Day combined.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but that's just one metric! The potential for a hundred and twenty-nine billion in a frigid tundra, Host_B, that's what we need to focus on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but that's just one metric! The potential for a hundred and twenty-nine billion in a frigid tundra, Host_B, that's what we need to focus on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...Alibaba is set to raise up to $12.9 billion in a landmark public listing in Hong Kong...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, we need to focus on 'indefinitely delayed.' That means it's not happening! It's a bust! A complete flop!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, we need to focus on 'indefinitely delayed.' That means it's not happening! It's a bust! A complete flop!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the skyrocketing demand for shares caused Alibaba to close its books earlier than expected, according to CNBC. Scheduled for November 26...
